# subscribe

Subscribes to subject updates.

```typescript
subscribe(subscription: (value: T) => void): () => void
```

## Parameters

| Parameter    | Type                 | Description                                |
| ------------ | -------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| subscription | `(value: T) => void` | Callback that will receive Subject values. |

## Returns

`() => void`

Unsubscribe function.
